# <a name="create-an-email-signature"></a><span data-ttu-id="376d9-102">建立電子郵件簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-102">Create an email signature</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="376d9-103">跳至</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="376d9-104">**設定** > **檢視所有的 Outlook 設定** > **撰寫及回覆**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="376d9-105">在 [**電子郵件簽章**] 下輸入您的簽章並使用可用的格式設定選項來變更其外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="376d9-106">*附註：* 您可以讓每個帳戶只能有一個簽章。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="376d9-107">若要深入了解，請參閱[建立和網頁型 Outlook 中新增電子郵件簽章](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="376d9-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
